name: JousTIC
description:
You are a knight
 and the King wants you
 to joust during the celebration for his newborn. Are you ready?

In this simple game you are jousting in the fashion of medieval jousting tournaments. Don't be worried though, it's just a celebration game and no one's going to be injured! Also, it's just a videogame :-)

Made in TIC-80 fantasy console in about 4 days.

Instructions:
Use UP and DOWN arrows to change position of your lance.
Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows to change the force of your lance.
Use X to start your horse when the countdown is over.

That's all: hope you'll enjoy it :-)
